item.description:
A leisurely Paddle from the Pierce Island boat launch up the Sagamore River.  Level 2  paddle for tide/current and winds.  Kayaks of at least 12 feet plus of length with bulk heads. PDF's must be worn at all times. Put in is at the island boat launch with a 5 dollar launch and park fee. High tide is approximately 2:00 P.M and low tide at 8:20 P.M. The air show is at Pease and hopefully we can catch  some the action from one or two vantage points on the Sagamore River. 

Directions: 

 http://www.mapquest.com/maps?address=2+Pierce+Island+Rd&city=Portsmouth&state=NH&zipcode=03801#e5d89ddd31152cdaca45de3a
item.name: Pierce Island - Sagamore River Paddle
